title: 10MIN everyday full body hourglass pilates workout // beginner friendly //w/verbal cues | LIDIAVMERA
description:
thank you so much for joining me on today's workout! if you are a beginner, this is perfect for you, and if you are more advanced try adding some ankle weights to make this more challenging for you 🤍

Hope you have fun doing this workout! 
Love you all, Lidi x

next workout video: Sunday 18th February, 11am ♡

♡ MORE OF ME ♡

channelDescription:
what a journey it is to understanding how to feel our best, so hey, lets do it together ♡ sharing my life as a 23 year-old living in London & my at-home workouts with you as a certified Pilates instructor (L3 pilates mat instructor) 
hope you stick around 🤍
ly all millions

comments: Yes to verbal cues and no loud music! Lovely! This is the point of pilates, focusing on breathing and mindful movement. Love your videos!! Great job
It’s the best of your video! Your instructions so helpful for focusing and breathing. Thanks!   And please, don’t stop it! It’s a really best way for pilates practice 🙏🙏🙏
As a 13 year old who had really wanting to be more productive and healthy this was really enjoyable and I’ll do this so much! Thank you! ❤
I really underestimated the intensity of this workout, but it got rid of my anxiety and calmed me down. Will definitely redo this 🙏

My new favorite workout. For the first time, I felt my mind and body were in the same mindset as I stretched. I actually felt the burn following instructions given in the voiceover. It was so calming, and I think I achieved proper form (finally). Thanks so much! I'm looking forward to more videos with a voiceover!
